import React, {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Form,Col,Row,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import {login} from '../actions/userActions' const LoginScreen = ({location}) => { const [email,setEmail]=useState('') const [password,setPassword]=useState('') const dispatch=useDispatch() const userLogin=useSelector(state=>state.userLogin) const {loading,error,userInfo}=userLogin const redirect=location.search ? location.search.split('=')[1]:'/' const submitHandler=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() //DISPATCH LOGIN } return (

Sign In

Email Address setEmail(e.target.value)}> Enter password setPassword(e.target.value)}>
New Customer? Register ) } export default LoginScreen
